{
    "_id":"{{Model Id - Organizations}}",
    "ModelName":"Organizations",
    "Description":"Various companies, non-profits, educational institutions, and legal entities",
    "SharedFields":
    [
        {
            "_id":"61574393ab3980c1f829ed5c",
            "FieldName":"Name",
            "_t":"TEXT",
            "IsRequired":true,
            "Revision":"",
            "ChangeType":1
        }
    ],
    "Variant":
    {
        "_id":"615d1b578491ed32bbb63295",
        "ModelId":"{{Model Id - Organizations}}",
        "Fields":
        [
            {
                "_id":"61574393ab3980c1f829ed5d",
                "FieldName":"EmployeeSize",
                "_t":"INTG",
                "MinValue":"1",
                "MaxValue":"350000",
                "IsRequired":false,
                "Revision":"",
                "ChangeType":1
            },
            {
                "_id":"615d1b578491ed32bbb632a5",
                "FieldName":"Industry",
                "_t":"PICK",
                "MinValue":"1",
                "MaxValue":"350000",
                "Options":["Agriculture","Retail","Software","Finance"],
                "IsRequired":false,
                "Revision":"",
                "ChangeType":1
            },
            {
                "_id":"6157438bab3980c1f829ed3b",
                "FieldName":"MarketCap",
                "_t":"MONY",
                "Currency":"USD",
                "MinValue":null,
                "MaxValue":null,
                "IsRequired":false,
                "Revision":"",
                "ChangeType":1
            },
            {
                "_id":"61574394ab3980c1f829ed5e",
                "FieldName":"Priority",
                "_t":"INTG",
                "MinValue":null,
                "MaxValue":null,
                "IsRequired":false,
                "Revision":"",
                "ChangeType":1
            }

        ],
        "Validators":
        [

        ],
        "Revision":"",
        "ChangeType":1
    }
}
